properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel; Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:17PM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 20 knots, increasing to 20 to 25 knots
with gusts to 30 knots Saturday night. Winds may occasionally
gust to 35 knots, especially at elevated locations. Waves 3 to 5
feet.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA,
Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA,
Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA and
Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including
the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
